CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1951, pg. 10." Mrs. Lloyd Mull...lovely Pittsburgh bride." Portions of article read: "The marriage of Claudelle Jurline Patterson and Lloyd Mull took place June 14,  The double ring ceremony was performed at home by the Rev. Eugene Roberts in presence of the immediate family.... The bride is the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Henry B. Patterson of Sterritt [sic] Street. A pink satin dress covered completely with nylon net, topped with a nylon net duster fashioned the bridal dress....The bride's only attendant was Mrs. Rachel Brooks, Aides were Mmes. Kay Jones, Lottie Lubey, Florence Adams and Norma Malone.  The best man was Edward Waton..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of best man Edward Waton, groom Lloyd Mull, bride Claudelle Jurline Patterson wearing satin dress and sheer nylon jacket, and matron of honor Rachel Brooks, posed in front of mantle, in Patterson home on Sterrett Street, horizontal format
